title: It Doesn’t Matter!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Ah, it’s raining, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hmm? What’s the matter? Did you not bring an umbrella? Yukiho handed me a folding umbrella when I left home, so wanna go in with me? Yoshiko-chaaaan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ku.... Kukuku.... Even the sun hides its form before Yohane’s power.... Also, it’s Yohane, okay<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eeeh-!! Your power did this, Yoshiko-chan!? Amazing!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Yes, my fallen angel power was too strong, that’s why it rained.... It has to be today of all days.... I’m sorry<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eh? What’s the problem with rain? Well, it may be harder to move around, but we’re going to go to a sweets buffet anyway, so it doesn’t matter~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ah.... I see? Really....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Besides, I’m quite the sunshine girl-. If we walk together, then I’m sure it’ll be cloudy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I-, is that so? I think Yohane’s power is stronger, but I guess I’ll call it a draw just for today....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
